Verses: 1 MOOPPANAAGIYA NAAN SATHTHIYATHTHINPADI NESIKKIRA PIRIYAMAANA KAAYUVUKKU EZHUDHUGIRADHAAVADHU:
2 PIRIYAMAANAVANE, UN AATHTHUMAA VAAZHGIRADHUPOLA NEE ELLAAVATRILUM VAAZHNDHU SUGAMAAYIRUKKUMPADI VENDUGIREN.
3 SAGODHARAR VANDHU NEE SATHTHIYATHTHILE NADANDHUKOLLUGIRAAI ENDRU UNNUDAIYA UNMAIYAIKKURITHTHU SAATCHI KODUTHTHAPODHU MIGAVUM SANDHOSHAPPATTEN.
4 EN PILLAIGAL SATHTHIYATHTHILE NADAKKIRAARGAL ENDRU KELVIPPADUGIRA SANDHOSHATHTHILUM ADHIGAMAANA SANDHOSHAM ENAKKU ILLAI.
5 PIRIYAMAANAVANE, NEE SAGODHARARUKKUM ANNIYARUKKUM SEYGIRA YAAVATRAIYUM UNMAIYAAI SEYGIRAAI.
6 AVARGAL UNNUDAIYA ANBAIK KURITHTHU SABAIKKUMUNBAAGA SAATCHISONNAARGAL; DHEVANUKKU MUNBAAGAP PAATHTHIRAMAANAPADI AVARGALAI NEE VAZHIVITTANUPPINAAL NALAMAAYIRUKKUM.
7 ENENIL AVARGAL PURAJAADHIYAARIDATHTHIL ONDRUM VAANGAAMAL AVARUDAIYA NAAMATHTHINIMITHTHAM PURAPPATTUPPONAARGAL.
8 AAGAIYAAL NAAM SATHTHIYATHTHIRKU UDANVELAIYAATKALAAYIRUKKUMPADI APPADIPPATTAVARGALAI SERTHTHUKKOLLA KADANAALIGALAAYIRUKKIROM.
9 NAAN SABAIKKU EZHUDHINEN; AANAALUM AVARGALIL MUDHANMAIYAAYIRUKKA VIRUMBUGIRA THIYOTHTHIREPPU ENBAVAN ENGALAI ETRUKKOLLAVILLAI.

10 AANAPADIYAAL, NAAN VANDHAAL, AVAN ENGALUKKU VIRODHAMAAIP POLLAADHA VAARTHTHAIGALAI ALAPPI, SEYDHUVARUGIRA KIRIYAIGALAI NINAITHTHUKKOLVEN. AVAN IPPADI SEYDHUVARUVADHUM PODHAAMAL, THAAN SAGODHARARAI ETRUKKOLLAAMALIRUKKIRADHUMANDRI, ETRUKKOLLA MANADHAAYIRUKKIRAVARGALAIYUM THADAISEYDHU, SABAIKKUP PURAMBE THALLUGIRAAN.
11 PIRIYAMAANAVANE, NEE THEEMAIYAANADHAIP PINPATRAAMAL, NANMAIYAANADHAIP PINPATRU, NANMAISEYGIRAVAN DHEVANAAL UNDAAYIRUKKIRAAN; THEEMAISEYGIRAVAN DHEVANAIK KAANAVILLAI.
12 THEMETHTHIRIYU ELLAARAALUM NARSAATCHIPETRADHUMALLAAMAL, SATHTHIYATHTHAALUM NARSAATCHIPETRAVAN; NAANGALUM SAATCHIKODUKKIROM, ENGAL SAATCHI MEYYENDRU ARIVEERGAL.
13 EZHUDHAVENDIYA KAARIYANGAL ANEGAMUNDU; AANAAL MAIYINAALUM IRAGINAALUM EZHUDHA ENAKKU MANADHILLAI.

14 SEEKKIRAMAAI UNNAIK KAANALAAMENDRU NAMBIYIRUKKIREN, APPOZHUDHU MUGAMUGAMAAI PESIKKOLLUVOM. UNAKKU SAMAADHAANAM UNDAAVADHAAGA. SINEGIDHAR UNAKKU VAAZHTHTHUDHAL SOLLUGIRAARGAL. SINEGIDHARAIP PERPERAAGA VAAZHTHTHUVAAYAAGA.
